EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Dear Steve,I wanted to follow up on the email below and introduce myself as the person at MBO Partners responsible for all new associate and partnership requests. I’ll be your main point of contact to provide you an overview of our services and answer any specific questions you may have. You may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by going here. <http://link.mbopartners.com/ol/0xEFfZmddHNcoUZ1%5Fu%2DNb%5Fmgz3iQN8jlq65yDbq2lMIt3kF6L7yJPEjr1YIDT8Z0dufDUUQVGpQ84QRdG%5FKbMopF9NVaBkC7VHX8j6yceoRKLOQ12dl17an49VQs%2D9uqvEX1W0MFcEVvNSulcasZszH0MacSBi7V32HvAaZxswwlkYRW%5F8CGZOPk1iGFoGjy4D60EGRp3ZOqu2XuJYNTgf5TkmUjuHwSfrHb2y3KwbF8vRYMpPh13ip8x9sjKcs7whuKUBb23rfSVcRjbKOwqProuMoDfi4BoaMBckz%2DE2OwCLivLDtzowuflAIOJD9NByRpBNk7kB2JsEFiXuw%5FcSi4oREJ0TJnk%2D4%2C/1gwVMIfFNB5UrAli4vGcJrvkiTDSNJuntvNEWtnM8ZAz0lxBZuPEZRP3vfJ6JpgRUuWSAhY2JcRxxg1bNsmbbYtKzt9ZH0CgTBfauJiPPaBbWoJGz9hIyo%2DM2WwwrZjRthmfLQ%2C%2C>You can watch a short video about who we are on You Tube <http://link.mbopartners.com/ol/0xEFfZmddHNcoUZ1%5Fu%2DNb%5Fmgz3iQN8jlq65yDbq2lMIt3kF6L7yJPEjr1YIDT8Z0dufDUUQVGpQ84QRdG%5FKbMopF9NVaBkC7VHX8j6yceoRKLOQ12dl17an49VQs%2D9uqvEX1W0MFcEVvNSulcasZszH0MacSBi7V32HvAaZxswwlkYRW%5F8CGZOPk1iGFoGjy4D60EGRp3ZOqu2XuJYNTgf5TkmUjuHwSfrHb2y3KwbF8vRYMpPh13ip8x9sjKcs7whuKUBb23rfSVcRjbKOwqProuMoDfi4BoaMBckz%2DE2OwCLivLDtzowuflAIOJD9NByRpBNk7kB2JsEFiXuw%5FcSi4oREJ0TJnk%2D4%2C/1gwVMM7QNEhWoFNjpf6cbbPGuy%5FXSaylnKopVvrtxvAq1kMjIPT6GWrVgvBmEJ4xcc%2DoVRIWEpNN6QJJEeqhVoRU%2D%2DdJJ2SKYW6trbTxWbhdaJ1G%2D%2Dhg852inTMh746m>. You can learn more about how MBO works by clicking here <http://link.mbopartners.com/ol/0xEFfZmddHNcoUZ1%5Fu%2DNb%5Fmgz3iQN8jlq65yDbq2lMIt3kF6L7yJPEjr1YIDT8Z0dufDUUQVGpQ84QRdG%5FKbMopF9NVaBkC7VHX8j6yceoRKLOQ12dl17an49VQs%2D9uqvEX1W0MFcEVvNSulcasZszH0MacSBi7V32HvAaZxswwlkYRW%5F8CGZOPk1iGFoGjy4D60EGRp3ZOqu2XuJYNTgf5TkmUjuHwSfrHb2y3KwbF8vRYMpPh13ip8x9sjKcs7whuKUBb23rfSVcRjbKOwqProuMoDfi4BoaMBckz%2DE2OwCLivLDtzowuflAIOJD9NByRpBNk7kB2JsEFiXuw%5FcSi4oREJ0TJnk%2D4%2C/1gwVMM7QNEZOogl76fOJI7v5kTDSadartLEyAfjxn8I81gVpff7EKx7ig8duCJ05OLuGNCM7KZpC9wBUGfSzStRQ%5FPReJ2i8STD1tIvee4xcZZhW5Pg0rYWw81YwucSrp3vlCEM7RzQ%5FQEPOTQ%2C%2C>.I look forward to speaking with you and sharing more information about MBO Partners!Thanks, Meghan ___________________Meghan MoulConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6359f: 703.793.6473e: mmoul@mbopartners.com <mailto:mmoul@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=moul> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. From: Pui Chiu [mailto:pchiu@atriumstaff.com <mailto:pchiu@atriumstaff.com>] Sent: Thursday, March 06, 2014 2:41 PM To: Team Pfizer Subject: New Enrollment - Steve Lopez Hi MBO – Please contact Steve to start the process. He has express interest in enrolling as an Exec. · Name: Steve Lopez· Email: Slopez90@yahoo.com <mailto:Slopez90@yahoo.com>· Phone: 586-945-0690· Drug/BG check required – No· Proposed start date – 4/1· Billing Rate (if known) – $130/hr - What type of work they are doing Requested Job Title: Sales Model ConsultantJob Description: Perform all daily system maintenance & updates, financial reporting for brand & RBU & ad hoc requests Thanks! Pui ChiuAssistant Program ManagerAtrium Managed Servicesp: 201.808.6516e: pchiu@atriumstaff.com <mailto:kdeutsch@atriumstaff.com>
